thread.section_title: ezCater Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ezCater | www.ezcater.com
thread.title: PhxLaura

author: PhxLaura
title: PhxLaura
text: Hosted meetings in St Pete for 30 people. Not knowing the area, I ordered from ezCater 5 times. They were fantastic and loved having a portal for online catering. I would like to have had more restaurants in the network. Placed over $1000 directly from other restaurants because they were not part of ezCater. eZCater would have been my first choice if they had a larger network. Panera should be added since we ordered from them twice directly. I would recommend ezCater.
